subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: David Krejci continued his torrid playoff pace with two more goals, and Tuukka Rask stopped 29 shots as Boston took a 1-0 lead in the Eastern Conference finals.
snippet: David Krejci continued his torrid playoff pace with two more goals, and Tuukka Rask stopped 29 shots as Boston took a 1-0 lead in the Eastern Conference finals.
